title: Foundries
content:
Perhaps this has been covered on here before, but I couldn’t find it... or maybe it is something that is so common knowledge as to go without comment.

I’m fairly new to graphic design & typography (at least compared to most on here) and I have compiled a list of type foundries I like, however there are some that I have seen and liked that I never bookmarked, and now I can’t find them.

I’d like to compile fairly comprehensive list of foundries (and I know there are many I don’t know about out there) that I like, and I figured it would be helpful to start one here. No foundry is too big or too small, but in the interest of simplicity, let’s not repeat listings in the thread.

I’ll start with an easy one.

[Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162849/http:/www.emigre.com/)

ok. go.

 [‹ New Bringhurst book](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162849/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49899 "Go to previous forum topic") [Original Besley Clarendon ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162849/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40635 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Lantz

comments.content:
thanks sii... I guess I should practice my search terming.

That will do just fine.

Nevermind :)
